Thunderstorm emitted small electric shocks that burned the cables 
tying him to the sub. He transformed back to bot mode and went besides 
Stallex.

Thunderstorm: So... who do you think would be the best suited to drive 
that thing?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Mustex: O.k. that'll do it.
> 
> Rhesus heads inside to convert the cargo space into a
> balask tank.
> 
> --- wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > Thunderstorm hovered with the sub underneath him.
> > When he was over the 
> > water stream, he dropped his altitude and started to
> > immerse the sub, 
> > but not too deep (enough to have the top half over
> > the water.).
> >

> > > manever (naturally Mustex tells Stallex, and

> > > > the
